posts.post_content:
Nothing crazy or rare.  I am trying the Piedmont back set, but not trying to break the bank.  Most of my cards are between a 1-2.5, but present very nicely.  

Also working on a Lavender back run!

Took a long break from collecting, but I am back at it with very little left save my T's.  Sold off my Delongs, my Cracker Jacks, and most everything else.

Scans of both sides always appreciated, and PMs always work best.

Thanks!

J.R.
